description.brief: A YAML Parsing library for C++

package.description:
yaml-cpp is a YAML parser and emitter in C++ written around the YAML 1.2 spec. It's based on (but not a wrapper to) the C library libyaml.
This is version 0.2.2 of yaml-cpp with a patch for 64 compabability.
Version Update Policy: We plan to track the latest release assuming backwards compatability.
Patch Update Policy: The patch has been submitted upstream to the yaml-cpp, it can be removed once accepted upstream. See http://code.google.com/p/yaml-cpp/issues/detail?id=44
package.author: Jesse Beder
